titleStmt.title: Memoriable song on the unhappy hunting in Chevy Chase between Earle Piercy of England and Earle Dowglas of Scotland. To the tune of the Flying Fame
Chevy Chase.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and W. Oilbertson,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "God prosper long our noble king,".
Place of publication from Wing, which estimates 1658-1674 as publication date.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
